text: obata yamkisi hondak siddha vuvahot (eya) ovunta kanagatuva gena denneya. obata yamkisi napurak sidu vuvahot nam, e venuven ovun satutata pat vannaha. ebævin oba ivasimen yutuva bhaya bhaktiyen sitiyahot ovunge kumantranaya obata kisima haniyak æti karanne næta. (mandayat) niyata vasayenma allah ovunge kriyavan vata karagena sitinneya
